ultraguard.title: UltraGuard
ultraguard.desc: An advanced polymer membrane with outstanding adhesion that seals micro-cracks and blocks water ingress for years.

bioguard.title: BioGuard
bioguard.desc: Reactive crystals penetrate deep into the matrix, creating an internal waterproof lattice that strengthens the structure.

smartguard.title: SmartGuard
smartguard.desc: A dual-component formula that cures into an elastic barrier, resisting both positive and negative hydrostatic loads.

fastguard.title: FastGuard
fastguard.desc: Ultra-rapid cementitious mortar that flashes into action, stopping active water flow and keeping operations on schedule.

richguard.title: RichGuard
richguard.desc: An acrylic-rich coating with high elongation that bridges cracks while delivering a sleek, uniform finish.
